parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Ryan, Queensland, 2010 and 2013.

parliamentary.appointments.title: Parliamentary Appointments
parliamentary.appointments.para: Parliamentary Representative on the Advisory Council on Australian Archives from 24.2.11.
Member, Expert Panel on the Constitutional Recognition of Local Government from 8.8.11 to 1.12.11.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Infrastructure and Communications from 25.10.10 (Chair from 9.12.13); Petitions from 4.12.13.
Joint Statutory: Public Accounts and Audit from 25.2.14.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Hon. Secretary, Warringah Federal Electorate Council.
Member, Liberal Party State Women's Council Executive (Qld).
Member, Liberal National Party Policy Standing Committee 2009-10.
Secretary, Coalition Policy Committee on Communications.
Member, Coalition Policy Committee on Rural and Regional Affairs.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Member, Australian Institute of Company Directors.
Personal Assistant to State Director, Country Party (NSW).
Staff member to the Minister for Education, Senator the Hon. Sir JL Carrick.
Director, Brisbane Visitors and Convention Bureau.
Business Manager, Australian Telecommunications User Group (ATUG) Queensland.
Member, Brisbane City Council 2000-10: Leader of the Opposition, Brisbane City Council 2007-08; Chairman, Public and Active Transport and Economic Development Committee 2010.

local.gov.service.title: Local Government Service
local.gov.service.para: Leader of the Opposition, Brisbane City Council 2007-08.
Chairman, Public and Active Transport and Economic Development Committee, Brisbane City Council 2010.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south-western Brisbane; it includes the suburbs of Anstead, Bellbowrie, Brookfield, Chapel Hill, Chuwar, Dorrington, Enoggera, Enoggera Reservoir, Ferny Grove, Fig Tree Pocket, Gaythorne, Grovely, Indooroopilly, Ironside, Karana Downs, Kenmore, Kenmore Hills, Keperra, Kholo, Mitchelton, Moggill, Mt Coot-tha, Mt Crosby, Oxford Park, Peewee Bend, Pinjarra Hills, Priors Pocket, Pullenvale, Rainworth, Rosalie, St Johns Wood, St Lucia, Taringa, The Gap, Toowong, Torwood, Upper Brookfield, Upper Kedron and parts of Ashgrove, Auchenflower, Bardon, Paddington and Lake Manchester.
Industries: retail and service industries, light industry and farming. It also includes the University of Queensland and a large portion of Brisbane Forest Park.
State electorates: Ryan includes parts of the Queensland Legislative Assembly electorates of Ashgrove, Everton, Ferny Grove, Indooroopilly, Ipswich West, Moggill and Mount Coot-tha.
